jd: From: Shubham Rao, GVR INFOTEK LLC shubham.rao@gvrinfotek.com Reply to: shubham.rao@gvrinfotek.com Hi,Job Title: AWS Elemental / Cloud EngineerDuration: : 12 monthsLocation: Fully remote but prefer west coast candidatesMOI: SkypeConsultant must have LinkedInAWS elemental services, in particular: Media Package version 1 to version 2 upgrades and media package in generalMedia ConnectMedia LiveCloudFrontDRM servicesAudio/visual worldNeed to be very well versed in audio/video mixing, the potential outputs for that kind of material, and be able to speak that language fluently.Grafana experienceJPEG XSAWS Cloud Engineer to design, implement, and manage cloud infrastructure. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AWS services, cloud architecture, and best practices for security and scalability.Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.Experience with AWS services and cloud architecture principles.Proficiency in scripting languages such as Python, Bash, or similar.Familiarity with CI/CD tools and methodologies.Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.AWS certification (e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect, AWS Certified Developer) is a plus.Thanks & Regards,Shubham RaoRecruitment Lead | GVR INFOTEK LLC : 13573 Tabasco Cat Trail, Frisco, TX 75035Email: shubham.rao@gvrinfotek.com
